title: Bist du bei mir
description: A popular aria from the Notebook for Anna Magdalena Bach, often attributed to Gottfried Heinrich Stölzel and arranged by Bach.

title: Komm, süßer Tod
description: A poignant and introspective song expressing a longing for death as a release from life's sorrows, included in the Schemelli Gesangbuch.

title: Wachet auf, ruft uns die Stimme
description: A well-known cantata composed for the 27th Sunday after Trinity, featuring the famous chorale 'Sleepers, Wake!'

title: Herz und Mund und Tat und Leben
description: A cantata composed for the feast of the Visitation of Mary, which includes the famous chorale 'Jesu, Joy of Man's Desiring'.

title: Ich steh an deiner Krippen hier
description: A devotional song from the Schemelli Gesangbuch, reflecting a humble and heartfelt worship of Christ.
